member.name: NMLVFINDITEMA
member.summary: Contains information the owner needs to find items requested by a virtual list-view control. This structure is used with the LVN_ODFINDITEM notification code.

member.name: NMLVFINDITEMA.hdr
member.summary: structure that contains information on this notification code.

member.name: NMLVFINDITEMA.iStart
member.summary: Index of the item at which the search will start.

member.name: NMLVFINDITEMA.lvfi
member.summary: structure that contains information necessary to perform a search.
